message: Let's start with this. I take a larger share, you get something and we avoid wasting time.
I think a more even split is fair. Let's go with this and avoid any risks.
Bob, let's be reasonable.  I'm open to you getting a significant share, but my initial offer was closer to a fair split.
Alice, let's end this.  A 50/50 split is the only fair outcome.  Don't be greedy.
